definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: The lights of the car dazzled me.
sentences.chinese: 汽車前燈的燈光使我目眩。

sentences.english: The headlights in the opposite lane made it hard to see.
sentences.chinese: 對面車道上的前燈很難照到這個地方。

sentences.english: Ada reached to the dashboard and cut off the headlights.
sentences.chinese: 阿達伸手到儀表板上關閉了車前燈。
車的前燈的光射進霧中。

sentences.english: Check whether or not the front light and power light work normally.
sentences.chinese: 前燈和電量顯示燈是否顯示正常。

sentences.english: The car's headlights flashed in my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 汽車的前燈對着我的眼睛閃了一下。

sentences.english: Our eyes were dazzled by the car's headlights.
sentences.chinese: 那部汽車的前燈燈光使我們的眼睛感到昏眩。

sentences.english: The front headlights are very swoopy like the sketches below.
sentences.chinese: 前面的前燈在下面是像素描一樣的最。

sentences.english: A vehicle body includes a fender and a headlamp assembly.
sentences.chinese: 一種車身，包括翼子板和前燈組件。

sentences.english: I'll flash my headlight to make sure he sees us.
sentences.chinese: 我會打開車前燈讓它閃爍，以保證他能看見我們。

sentences.english: So her she was, roaming the City of Angels with her headlights blazing bright.
sentences.chinese: 於是她就這樣，“前燈”閃亮的在這個天使之城閒逛。

sentences.english: David's headlights were fitted with blackout masks, but he drove very fast just the same.
sentences.chinese: 雖然前燈上裝着閉燈罩，大衛仍驅車如飛。

sentences.english: The car needs a new headlight.
Keep headlights clean and working . Do the same for taillights and signal lights.
sentences.chinese: 保持前燈，尾燈和信號燈清潔和工作。

sentences.english: The head light of our car dimmed.
sentences.chinese: 我們的汽車前燈減光了。

definition: to return something to its rightful owner
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
